com.punchthrough.bean.sdk.internal.utility

Class Chunk

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.punchthrough.bean.sdk.internal.utility.Chunk

  • public class Chunk
extends java.lang.Object
    A set of utilities to make it easy for classes to generate discrete "chunks" from byte arrays of arbitrary data.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Chunk.Chunkable
      Chunkable classes must provide an array of byte data to be split into chunks.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Chunk()

        public Chunk()

    • Method Detail

      • bytesFrom

        public static <T extends Chunk.Chunkable> byte[] bytesFrom(T chunkable,
                                                           int offset,
                                                           int length)
        Retrieve a number of raw bytes at an offset.
        Parameters:
        offset - The byte at which to start, zero-indexed
        length - The number of bytes to return. If this is greater than the number of bytes available after offset, it will return all available bytes, truncated at the end.
        Returns:
        The bytes, starting at offset of length length or less if truncated

      • chunkFrom

        public static <T extends Chunk.Chunkable> byte[] chunkFrom(T chunkable,
                                                           int chunkLength,
                                                           int chunkNum)
        Retrieve a chunk of raw bytes. Chunks are created by slicing the array at even intervals. The final chunk may be shorter than the other chunks if it's been truncated.
        Parameters:
        chunkLength - The length of each chunk
        chunkNum - The chunk at which to start, zero-indexed
        Returns:
        The chunk (array of bytes)

      • chunkCountFrom

        public static <T extends Chunk.Chunkable> int chunkCountFrom(T chunkable,
                                                             int chunkLength)
        Retrieve the count of chunks for a given chunk length.
        Parameters:
        chunkLength - The length of each chunk
        Returns:
        The number of chunks generated for a given chunk length

      • chunksFrom

        public static <T extends Chunk.Chunkable> java.util.List<byte[]> chunksFrom(T chunkable,
                                                                            int chunkLength)
        Retrieve all chunks for a given chunk length. The final chunk may be shorter than the other chunks if it's been truncated.
        Parameters:
        chunkLength - The length of each chunk
        Returns:
        A list of chunks (byte arrays)
